price: 30. Dheh: Bal ka warrama hadday biyihiin- nu dhulka ku guraan, waa kee kan idiin keeni kara biyo socda oo dur dur ah?.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ
footnotes: Ma jiro waxaan Alle ahayn oo keeni kara.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
